		// - pages links (numbers at top and bottom)
 var tafsir_btn_clicked=false;
function set_tafsir_pages_links() 

{

	$('.Paging a').click(function(){

		stat.tafsir.page = $(this).attr('href').replace(/^.*#/, '');

		refresh_screen();

		return false;

	});

}



// - scroll to section

function scroll_to_section(section)

{

	$el = $('#sec_' + section).eq(0);

	

	if ($el.size() > 0) {

		var p = $el.position().top; // - $('#sura').height();

		///if (typeof console != 'undefined') console.log('section = ' + section + ' P = ' + p + ', X = ' + u2p(p, $('#tafsir').attr('max')));

		var $slider = $("div[rel='text']").find('.space').eq(0);

		$slider.slider('value', u2p(p, $('#text').attr('max')));

	}

}



// - show tafsir

function show_tafsir(html, section) {

	$('#sura').removeClass('loading');

	$("#sura #text").html(html);

	$('<div class="clear"></div>').appendTo("#sura #text");

	

	set_tafsir_pages_links();

	reset_slider('text', true);

	scroll_to_section(section);

	

	var f1 = function () { reset_slider('text', false); };

	setTimeout(f1, 1000);

	

	var f2 = function () { fix_slider_max('text') }

	setTimeout(f2, 1000);

	setTimeout(f2, 3000);

	setTimeout(f2, 5000);

	

	if (playlist == null) player_new_sura();

}



// - find aya location

function tafsir_aya_location(aya_no) {

	var key = 'tafsir-pages-' + REVISION + '-' + stat.sura;

	var pages_code = localStorage.getItem(key);

	

	if (pages_code == null) {

		$.ajax({

			async: false,

			type: "get",

			url: 'tafsir-pages-' + stat.sura + '.js',

			success: function(response) {

				localStorage.setItem(key, response);

				pages_code = response;

			}

		});

	}

	

	var z = new Array();

	eval(pages_code);
//	Added by Odai    
    //    if(aya_no != 1)
    //        stat.tafsir.page = z[aya_no][0];
    if(tafsir_btn_clicked){
        stat.tafsir.page = (aya_no != 1) ? z[aya_no][0] : 1;
        tafsir_btn_clicked=false;
    }
    //    End by Odai
    //    stat.tafsir.page = (aya_no != 1) ? z[aya_no][0] : 1;
    //    Deleted by Odai

	var section = (aya_no != 1) ? z[aya_no][1] : 0;

	

	return section;

}



// - load tafsir

function load_tafsir(aya_no) {
if(aya_no==1)
{
aya_no=0;
}
	// - display loading

	$('#sura-body').hide();

	$('#sura #text').html('').scrollTop(0);

	$('#sura').addClass('loading');

	

	// - get aya page and section

	var section = 0;

	if (aya_no) section = tafsir_aya_location(aya_no);

	

	// - get data from localstorage

	var id = status_to_hash('sp');

	var key1 = 'tafsir-' + REVISION + '-' + id;

	var tafsir = localStorage.getItem(key1);

	

	if (tafsir != null) { // - load data when they are not ready

		show_tafsir(tafsir, section);

	} else { // - get from php if they are not saved

		$.ajax({

			type: "get",

			url: 'tafsir-' + id + '.html',

			success: function(response) {

				localStorage.setItem(key1, response);

				show_tafsir(response, section);

			}

		});

	}

	

	// - show sura information

	var key2 = 'sura-' + REVISION + '-' + stat.sura;

	sura_json = localStorage.getItem(key2);

	

	if (sura_json != null) { // - load data when they are not ready

		display_sura_data();

	} else { // - get from php if they are not saved

		$.ajax({

			type: "get",

			url: 'sura' + stat.sura + '.js',

			success: function(response) {

				sura_json = response;

				localStorage.setItem(key2, sura_json);

				display_sura_data();

			}

	   });

	}

	

	// - prepare aya selector

	if (sura_data != null) if (sura_data.ayas_count != $('#ayas > ul > li').size()) prepare_aya_selector(sura_data.ayas_count, aya_no);

}



// - go to aya in tafsir mode

function tafsir_goto_aya(aya_no) {

	// - get current page

	var key1 = status_to_hash('sp');	

	

	// - get aya page and section

	var section = 0;

	if (aya_no) section = tafsir_aya_location(aya_no);

	

	// - get new page

	var key2 = status_to_hash('sp');

	

	///if (typeof console != 'undefined') console.log('TAFSIR ' + aya_no + ' ' + key1 + ' ' + key2 + ' ' + section);

	

	// - go to aya

	if (key1 != key2) { // new page

		load_tafsir(aya_no);

	} else { // - current page

		scroll_to_section(section)

	}

	

	// - selector

	$('#ayas li.active').removeClass('active');

	$('#ayas a[href="#' + aya_no + '"]').parent().addClass('active');

	$("#ayas span.value").text(aya_no);

}

ٱلَّذِى عَلَيْهِ ٱلْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُۥ بِٱلْعَدْلِۚ وَٱسْتَشْهِدُواْ شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْۖ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا class="link" rel="aya-282" lang="en" onclick="sa(282, 'en');" ondblclick="pa(this);">O you who have believed, when you contract a debt for a specified term, write it down. And let a scribe write [it] between you in justice. Let no scribe refuse to write as Allah has taught him. So let him write and let the one who has the obligation dictate. And let him fear Allah, his Lord, and not leave anything out of it. But if the one who has the obligation is of limited understanding or weak or unable to dictate himself, then let his guardian dictate in justice. And bring to witness two witnesses from among your men. And if there are not two men [available], then a man and two women from those whom you accept as witnesses – so that if one of the women errs, then the other can remind her. And let not the witnesses refuse when they are called upon. And do not be [too] weary to write it, whether it is small or large, for its [specified] term. That is more just in the sight of Allah and stronger as evidence and more likely to prevent doubt between you, except when it is an immediate transaction which you conduct among yourselves. For [then] there is no blame upon you if you do not write it. And take witnesses when you conclude a contract. Let no scribe be harmed or any witness. For if you do so, indeed, it is [grave] disobedience in you. And fear Allah. And Allah teaches you.
